resources.string: CammentSDK
In order to use Camment feature you need to grant the access to video and audio recording
%s invited you to a private chat
Would you like to join the conversation?
Join
No
OK
Cancel
Done
%s entered your camment chat!
Maybe it would be polite to say hi with a camment?
Done! We’ll let you know when your friend(s) arrive.
In the meanwhile, lay back and enjoy the show - or maybe you could make a welcome camment to your friend(s)
Tap & hold to record a mini video (camment)
Swipe ← left anywhere to hide camments
Swipe → right to show camments
Great success! Now tap the camment to play it
Pull the camment button ↓ down to invite friends to this chat
Tap & hold your camment to delete it
Would you like to video chat with friends while watching this show?
It\'s like SMS group messaging but with mini videos (camments) on top of the show you are now watching
Sounds fun
Maybe later
Choose action
Delete camment
